long_description: With 3 sets of lenses, the women's Smith Parallel Interchangeable Sunglasses let you cover all your outdoor needs, from racing to chilling. Frames come with 3 sets of interchangeable lenses-blackout, red and clear-for all light conditions; all block 100% of harmful UV rays. Carbonic TLT polycarbonate lenses are highly impact-resistant; special coating helps water bead up and roll right off. Hydrophilic Megol nose and temple pads gently grip the face; grip actually improves when wet. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Smith Parallel Interchangeable Sunglasses for women deliver a medium-profile fit with extra-large base 9 lens coverage.
short_description: With 3 sets of lenses, the women's Smith Parallel Interchangeable Sunglasses let you cover all your outdoor needs, from racing to chilling.
